body_html: I failed to notice the pyvenv-3.4 command. In that case, this is probably a bug in pip. The backtrace seems to trace only into pip, which seems to be trying to create a folder in your system directory, even though the virtualenv is activated.

body: I failed to notice the pyvenv-3.4 command. In that case, this is probably a bug in pip. The backtrace seems to trace only into pip, which seems to be trying to create a folder in your system directory, even though the virtualenv is activated.
